ArkhamAsylum.text: The guards of the sanitarium are aware that there is an intruder. Make a Sneak (-1) check to escape. If you pass, move to the street. If you fail, you are arrested and taken to the Police Station.

IndependenceSquare.text: A shadow falls across you from no apparent source and you shiver with more than cold. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity.

BankOfArkham.text: "This is a stick-up, see? Nobody move!" Three men armed with tommy guns rob the bank while you"re standing in line. Make a Combat (-1) check. If you pass, you drive them off. Nothing happens. If you fail, lose all of your money.
